FuncDef: The reset cpu-defend host-car statistics command clears packet statistics in the user-level rate limiting. The reset cpu-defend host-car statistics command clears packet statistics in the user-level rate limiting.
CLIs: reset cpu-defend host-car [ mac-address <mac-address> ] statistics [ slot <slot-id> ]

ParaDef.Info:
Clears statistics on the packets from the specified MAC address.
The value is in the format of H-H-H.

Clears packet statistics on the specified slot.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters without spaces.
